prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Structural typical detail sheet continuing from S3.0. Contains plate bolting and anchor bolt schedule, shearwall intersection details, shearwall assembly details for both-side and one-side sheathing configurations, holdown and SSTB anchor schedule table, and slab/raised floor anchor sub-details. APPROVED stamp present.
key_content: Anchor bolt: 1" DIA. A.B. @ 6" typical, other spacing at shearwalls
Shearwall intersections: 4x min. at holdown, 1x6 @ E.N. spacing
Shearwall assembly (both sides): shear clip detail, edge nailing to HD, blocking @ all panels, LTF4 & A35 spacing
Shearwall assembly (one side): top plate splice per plan, edge nailing, blocking @ all panels
Holdown posts: 4x or 6x4 minimum, 5/8" STD anchor
Slab detail, slab front, raised detail, raised front, miniwall sub-details shown
Notes: concrete end distances per graphics, min bolt center-to-center spacing 1.1, min 3x4 washer at each bolt, rebar required at top of stem wall foundations
APPROVED stamp: Anthony Montes - Building Plan Check

drawing_zones.content: Typ. plate bolting & anchor bolts — bolt size / plate washer schedule table and notes
Plate bolting cross-sections — A/B bolts, headed bolts, stagger spacing at shearwalls
Shearwall intersections — plan views showing 4x min at holdown, E.N. spacing configurations
Shearwall assembly w/ sheathing on both sides — shear clip detail, assembly notes, type table
Shearwall assembly w/ sheathing on one side — assembly description, staggered nailing table
Holdown and SSTB anchor schedule — full-width table with HD marks, Simpson hardware, allowable tension values, post requirements
Slab detail, slab front, raised detail, raised front, miniwall — small cross-section sub-details
General structural notes (8 items) — concrete end distances, bolt spacing, washer requirements, rebar at stem walls
